definitions.definition: To exercise influence over; to suggest or dictate the behavior of.
definitions.example: With a simple remote, he could control the toy truck.

definitions.definition: (construed with for) To design (an experiment) so that the effects of one or more variables are reduced or eliminated.
Inhibited or restrained in one's words and actions.
Resulting from a comparison with control samples.
(in combination) Under the control of the specified entity.
